item.description:
Namaste.....

 

Let's gather together in the beginning of 2012 and celebrate!  

 

Let's practice Tantra together --- feel more connected to ourselves and to each other.   We'll learn a technique that allows you to attract what you want to you, open up to receiving deeply and feel profoundly connected to Source.  We'll breathe, chant, move, meditate and you'll leave feeling ALIVE AND IN LOVE!  (I love feeling that way, how about you?)  

 

I wanted to let you know that the gathering has the following intentions:

 

  • To provide sacred space for love-minded people to come together and be together
  • To offer time to connect with yourself, your body and heart and witness what is present
  • To offer the space to connect with others in a sacred and loving way

 

And this entry into the 2012 has the ADDITIONAL INTENTION of looking back at the Tantra Community Gatherings in 2011 and how they, along with your own practice and places you've been, support you in opening to a daily practice.  

 

Some questions we will mull over together -- How does Tantra fit into my life?  What does that mean anyway?  How can I bring the sacred into every day?  

 

Please come prepared -- having given this a bit of thought and a journal may be useful, too.  

 

I am looking forward to being in sacred loving space with all of you tomorrow night.

 

Warmly,

Robyn
item.name: New Year's Tantra Community Gathering
